NEWJobHuntResearch.0: Read company media, such as employee blogs or company culture videos
NEWJobHuntResearch.1: Company reviews from third party sites (e.g. Glassdoor, Blind)
NEWJobHuntResearch.4: Read other media like news articles, founder profiles, etc. about the company
NEWJobHuntResearch.5: Directly asking current or past employees at the company
